arts.ttl: Gary Neville blames Virgil van Dijk for Man United's stunning goal inside just 62 SECONDS at Anfield and pinpoints the moment that 'stunned' him
arts.sum: Bryan Mbeumo put United ahead after just 60 seconds, racing beyond Liverpool's back line before slotting past Mamardashvili. The away end erupted as Amorim's side took an early lead.

arts.ttl: Niall Horan makes Anfield return for Liverpool vs Man Utd after joining forces with FSG
arts.sum: Former One Direction singer Niall Horan was in attendance at Anfield for Liverpool's Premier League clash with Man United on Sunday afternoon

arts.ttl: BREAKING - Premier League Match Centre issue update as Liverpool denied penalty vs Man Utd
arts.sum: Liverpool were denied a penalty during the first half of their clash against Manchester United at Anfield on Sunday afternoon.

arts.ttl: Sky Sports confirm reason why referee did NOT stop Liverpool vs Man Utd for head injury
arts.sum: Bryan Mbeumo scored for Manchester United with only 63 seconds on the clock in their Premier League clash with Liverpool, but the goal was shrouded in controversy

arts.ttl: Liverpool players fuming as referee makes controversial decision to allow Man Utd goal
arts.sum: Manchester United scored just two minutes into their game with Liverpool on Sunday but Bryan Mbeumo's goal was controversial as Alexis Mac Allister was down with a head injury

arts.ttl: BREAKING Gary Neville points blame at one Liverpool player after shock Man Utd start
arts.sum: Manchester United got off to the perfect start against Liverpool, as Bryan Mbeumo got in behind to score, but much was said about Virgil van Dijk's defending

arts.ttl: Mbeumo STUNS Anfield after 61 SECONDS - but should play have been stopped?
arts.sum: Bryan Mbeumo stuns Anfield with the opener for Manchester United.

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim reveals why he dropped Benjamin Sesko heading into Liverpool clash - and the weapon he hopes can undo the champions
arts.sum: Ruben Amorim revealed why he dropped Benjamin Sesko in the build-up to Manchester United's blockbuster clash against Liverpool.

arts.ttl: Wirtz and Sesko on the bench as Liverpool and Man Utd clash
arts.sum: Florian Wirtz has once again been named on the bench as Liverpool take on Manchester United in the Premier League this afternoon. Arne Slot has made no changes to the starting lineup that lost to Chelsea before the October international break, with Dominik Szoboszlai picked ahead of the German playmaker for a second week running. arts.ttl: Liverpool v Man Utd team news: Hosts unchanged, Sesko sub
arts.sum: Kick-off is at 16:30 BST The post Liverpool v Man Utd team news: Hosts unchanged, Sesko sub appeared first on Best FPL Tips, Advice, Team News, Picks, and Statistics from Fantasy Football Scout.
